prompt: Find PR #42 in 'myorg/universal-mcp'. Post a comment on it: 'Please add tests for the new feature.' Report the comment ID.
gold_response: Posted comment 'Please add tests for the new feature.' on PR #42 in 'myorg/universal-mcp'. Comment ID: icXXXXXX.

rubric.criteria: The agent must find PR #42 in the 'myorg/universal-mcp' repository.
The agent must post the exact comment 'Please add tests for the new feature.' on that PR.
The agent must report the ID of the created comment.
